attributes.action: Provide support for the 3 million forgotten self employed
attributes.additional_details: The impact this will be having on businesses, personal life and mental health will be astronomical. It needs addressing as soon as possible and support provided just like all others have had!
attributes.background: Provide some form of income or grant scheme to support 3M self employed who have fallen through the cracks. Rishi Sunaks famous promise of ‘no-one will be left behind’ has not been fulfilled and we are now nearly near a year with little or no income.
